Data Analysis Notebooks

Interactive Jupyter notebooks showcasing data analysis, machine learning experiments, and technical explorations. Each notebook combines code, visualizations, and narrative analysis.

No notebooks available yet

Data analysis notebooks will appear here as they are converted and published. These will include Jupyter notebooks covering various topics from chess engine analysis to data science experiments.

To add notebooks:

  1. Place your .ipynb files in the _notebooks directory
  2. Run python scripts/convert_notebooks.py to convert them
  3. The converted markdown files will appear in _posts
